body.name: 32oz Insulated Water Bottle with Paracord Handles & Strap, 2 Lids(Straw Lid&Spout Lid), Stainless Steel Reusable Wide Mouth Metal Water Bottle With Straw, Double Walled, Thermo Mug,（White Leoqard)

features: Paracord Handles & Strap：32 oz water bottles Equipped with high quality colorful nylon braided Paracord Handles, bid farewell to the uncomfortable grip feeling, make the lifting more relaxed! Insulated 32 oz water bottle also comes with a 70.86 inches retractable strap, which can be worn directly on the body to free your hands and allow you to ride, climb, hike, rock climb and surf freely.

2 LEAKPROOF LIDS: Insulated water bottle with straw is equipped with 2 lids-Straw Lid& Spout Lid, both of which are sealed and leak-proof，Straw lid is right for cold beverages. Spout Lid is suitable for room temperature or hot drinks, It has two-stage force design to ensure that the lid won't fall off and knock your nose when you open it while drinking.

TRIPLE INSULATION: Stainless steel water bottles with Triple-insulation technology，2 stainless steel walls enclosing an inner copper, this keeps the insulated water bottle 32 oz Cold up to 24+ hours and Hot up to 12 hours, which also can reduce the condensation effectively. Insulated water bottles ensures you have a cool drink after exercise in summer or enjoy warm coffee outdoor in winter.

INSULATED WATER BOTTLE: Metal water bottle is made of food grade 18/8 stainless steel, 100% BPA free and non-toxic. Buy 32 oz thermal water bottles and get 8 accessories （1*Paracord Handle, 1* Aluminium alloy mountaineering buckle，1*Shoulder Straps, 1*Straw Lid, 1*Spout Lid, 2* Straws, 1*Straw Brush).

"MULTIPLE COLORS: Metal water bottle comes with 32oz capacity and a variety of colors for your options. Enabling you to choose the bottle according to your mood while maintaining good hydration. Powder coating and insulated surface material prevent the water bottle from sweating, providing you with a dry and refreshing user experience.With a capacity of 32oz, this water bottle meets your daily hydration needs. It stands at a height of 9.84 inches with a bottom diameter of 3.58 inches and does not fit in car cupholder."

WIDE APPLICATIONS: Compared to A One-time paper cup, this reusable water bottle is not only suitable for your own use in many scenarios: School, family, work, gym, sports, travel, outdoor, Insulated water bottles with straw but also suitable for as a birthday present, mother's day gift, father's day gifts, Christmas gifts, for your parents, children, husband, wife, friends, colleagues and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exceeded my expectations in every way
reviews.reviewText: The thoughtful design and practical features make it my go-to hydration companion.The paracord handles not only add a touch of style but also provide a comfortable and secure grip. Whether I'm hiking, at the gym, or simply on the go, the handles make it easy to carry, and the paracord adds a rugged and durable element to the overall design.What sets this water bottle apart is the inclusion of two lids – one with a straw and another with a convenient spout. This versatility caters to different preferences and activities. The straw lid is perfect for effortless sipping during workouts, while the spout lid ensures easy access for quick, on-the-go hydration.The insulation feature is a game-changer, keeping my beverages at the desired temperature for an extended period. Whether it's ice-cold water on a hot day or a warm beverage during chilly outings, this bottle maintains the perfect temperature, adding a refreshing touch to my day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for hiking
reviews.reviewText: The 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle with Paracord Handles & Strap has become my trusty companion for staying hydrated on the go. This durable bottle boasts a sizeable capacity, keeping me refreshed throughout the day. The addition of Paracord handles and a strap enhances its portability, making it easy to carry during hikes, workouts, or daily commutes.One memorable use of this water bottle was during a weekend hiking trip. The insulation proved its worth, keeping my water refreshingly cool even under the sun. The Paracord handles provided a secure grip, and the strap allowed me to sling the bottle over my shoulder, leaving my hands free to navigate the trails.The versatility of having two lids adds a practical touch. The standard screw-on lid is great for quick sips, while the second lid with a flip-top design is handy when I want a more controlled flow or need to seal the bottle tightly to prevent spills.The overall design is not just functional but also rugged and stylish. The Paracord accents give it a distinct look, and the durable construction has held up well to the occasional bumps and drops, showcasing its resilience in various environments.Whether I'm at the gym, at work, or exploring the outdoors, this insulated water bottle has proven itself as a reliable hydration solution. It strikes a balance between functionality and durability, and the thoughtful addition of Paracord handles and a strap makes it a standout choice for those who value both practicality and style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Title: Stylish and Functional Hydration!
reviews.reviewText: The KXIAOCHEN 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle is my new favorite for on-the-go hydration. The paracord handles and strap make it easy to carry, adding a rugged touch. Its insulation keeps drinks cold for hours, perfect for workouts or hot days. The 32 oz capacity is convenient, and the stainless steel build feels durable. Easy to clean with a sleek design, it's a stylish and practical choice for anyone on the move! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting chill
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is a game-changer in hydration. This bottle not only keeps your drinks refreshingly cold for an extended period but also stands out for its user-friendly features. The enduring chill factor ensures a lasting coolness, making it perfect for on-the-go hydration. Cleaning is a breeze with its simple design, and the inclusion of an extra straw and changeable lid adds a thoughtful touch, enhancing the overall convenience and versatility of this must-have water bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this water bottle. Cool color, keeps my water cold, and heavy duty. So far hasn’t started to leak which is a plus. The straw does seem a little too small and it’s hard to get a lot of water. I May switch to the other lid but I’m glad it did come with options

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hubby bought me a high end half gallon from a well known body building site and my daughter instantly wanted to match. Found this gem and looks a lot like mine with the leopard pattern. Actually, her pattern looks better with the high gloss. Quality is good from what I can tell. We shall see how long it holds up and hold fluids cold.The container comes with two lids and two straps, a short and a long one. Both are great for my child to carry around school, hoping she doesn’t lose track of the water bottle (again).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bottle for my daughter who is in second grade (she chose it). It is WAY too big and heavy when full for a young kid, as it would fall out of her side backpack pocket from the weight. But is perfect for me! Having the strap is a great feature. Comes with 2 straws and a cleaning brush and is pretty easy to clean. Keeps my drink cold for the whole workday. Only con is that it does not fit in my cup holder in my car. But since it doesn't leak, I am comfortable keeping it in my bag or on the passenger seat. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use-keeps drinks cold as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Great value-good quality-the handle is great for people with arthritis
